original_text: And the Lord said, Who then is that faithful and wise steward, whom his lord shall make ruler over his household, to give them their portion of meat in due season?
korean_text: 주께서 이르시되 지혜 있고 진실한 청지기가 되어 주인에게 그 집 종들을 맡아 때를 따라 양식을 나누어 줄 자가 누구냐

sentences.original_text: Who then is that faithful and wise steward
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그 충성되고 지혜 있는 청지기가 누구냐

sentences.original_text: whom his lord shall make ruler over his household
sentences.korean_translation: 그 주인이 자기 집에서 다스리게 할 자

sentences.original_text: to give them their portion of meat in due season
